channel.title: New Development!
channel.description:
[center]New Development! Hey Name Dj But u Can pwnage2u or dj anyone will do
im here because i am making a new server..... and before i start adding training mini games etc etc i want to know WHAT ARE THINGS that people look for mostly in there servers...... im making this because i dont want a lame server that 11 people login and then everyones gone i want this to be a good server with people always logging in :)
any ideas are apprecaited Thank You heaps
regards Dj aka pwnage2u[/center]

item.title: New Development!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You need to stop using WinterLove based servers because ever single server based off WL fails, even mine.

Read full topic

item.title: New Development!
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
@pwnage2u wrote:

rofl i wont make EVER city have something but i will try and get MOST citys to have something.

Read full topic

item.title: New Development!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Yea just make your server original, and don’t make it too easy or people will get borred of it in a week, just make it like no other!! Diff training place, good staff, good commands (Like ::starter and they get 500k, not every singal phat lol!)

Read full topic

item.title: New Development!
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
@pwnage2u wrote:

[quote=“bloodpk3r, post:3, topic:218093”]okay well if your making a new server first off you need good staff members who arent corrupt and cant be bribed into making people into mods etc…

  1. you need to have popular places in the server
  • pking area
    *shops
    *mini games etc…

but the places you put them have to be unique places people havent put them b4!
also some new ideas would be great if you know the coding to do it e.g making ur own mini games or making a battling arena or making new skills etc…

it needs to be realisticish dont make it so that straight away you get 99 att because people will find it to easy but then again dont make it as hard as the real runescape you need to find an exp rate that people enjoy but dont get annoyed with.

then you need unique stuff that maybe only a few servers have or that is completely new

  • in game scoreboards
  • all skills working
  • the new skills
    etc…

also your server needs very high uptime or 24/7 uptime because people hate offline servers so maybe a dedi?

you also will want a website/forum for the server as a lot of people will find this as an attraction.

hope this helped you with your request :)[/quote]

ty that helped me alot ill get straite onto most of it

Read full topic

item.title: New Development!
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

What he said and server that you can go to any city and theres something to do, dont just limit it to one area of the map

Read full topic

item.title: New Development!

item.description:
@bloodpk3r wrote:

okay well if your making a new server first off you need good staff members who arent corrupt and cant be bribed into making people into mods etc…

  1. you need to have popular places in the server
  • pking area
    *shops
    *mini games etc…

but the places you put them have to be unique places people havent put them b4!
also some new ideas would be great if you know the coding to do it e.g making ur own mini games or making a battling arena or making new skills etc…

it needs to be realisticish dont make it so that straight away you get 99 att because people will find it to easy but then again dont make it as hard as the real runescape you need to find an exp rate that people enjoy but dont get annoyed with.

then you need unique stuff that maybe only a few servers have or that is completely new

  • in game scoreboards
  • all skills working
  • the new skills
    etc…

also your server needs very high uptime or 24/7 uptime because people hate offline servers so maybe a dedi?

you also will want a website/forum for the server as a lot of people will find this as an attraction.

hope this helped you with your request
